Quest.Name: Team building
Quest.Description: Enter battle with a Water hero

Quest.Name: Go for Level 5
Quest.Description: Your team is ready to grow stronger! Reach level 5!

Quest.Name: The More, the Better
Quest.Description: There's strength in numbers! You'll feel it once you build a 4 member team! Build a team of 4 heroes!

Quest.Name: Everything's Annoying...
Quest.Description: We understand pressing skill buttons gets boring for you. Win a battle by using Auto Battle.

Quest.Name: Go for level 10
Quest.Description: It's always excited to learn something new! Reach level 10!

Quest.Name: Watch Out for Ice Swords
Quest.Description: This Assassin slashes horrible ice sword to freeeze! Defeat 10 Assassins!

Quest.Description: Join and win the Chaos Castle event
